title: Chris Hemsworth reveals how much his three children love their new Yamaha Peewee 50 dirt bikes
text:
Last month, he was spotted picking up three Yamaha Peewee 50 dirt bikes for his children on the Gold Coast.

And on Thursday, Chris Hemsworth revealed just how much his children were loving their new bikes.

Taking to Instagram, the 36-year-old actor shared a video of his children zooming around on the bikes in a field, admitting he was a little scared of them getting hurt.

Scroll down for video

'Meet you guys at the emergency room!' Chris Hemsworth revealed on Thursday how much his three children love their new Yamaha Peewee 50 dirt bikes as he shared a video of them zooming around him and wife Elsa Pataky

In the clip, Chris can be seen watching his children alongside wife Elsa Pataky.

The pair share daughter India, seven, and twin sons Tristan and Sasha, five, together.

'This is a safe sport to get the kids into, yeah?' he joked.

Zooming around! 'This is a safe sport to get the kids into, yeah?' he joked

'It's really, really safe,' the dotting dad sarcastically continued.

'I'll meet you guys at the emergency room,' he concluded before he ended the clip, which he captioned: 'Kids goin (sic) mad.'

In an interview with E! News in January 2015, Chris spoke about how becoming a dad had changed his life.

Doting dad: In an interview with E! News in January 2015, Chris spoke about how becoming a dad had changed his life

'I think it makes you less selfish, because it's no longer about you. It can't be,' he told the publication.

'It's about someone else, which is refreshing. It's nice to not spend all your time thinking about your own problems... and I just have so much fun doing it. It's the best.'

'And now I'm a bit more choosy, I think, with when I work and how I work because it better be worthwhile to take me away from them.'
description: Last month, he was spotted picking up three Yamaha Peewee 50 dirt bikes for his children on the Gold Coast.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
